sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Rename the system property "incident.refresh_impacted.include_affected_cis" to "com.snc.incident.refresh_impacted.include_affected_cis" to be inline with the rest of refresh impacted service through ITSM</description> <name>Rename incident refresh services</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var prop = new GlideRecord('sys_properties'); if (prop.get('name', 'incident.refresh_impacted.include_affected_cis')) { prop.setValue('name', 'com.snc.incident.refresh_impacted.include_affected_cis'); prop.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-10-19 08:20:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>61103ca9239b70108cd8dc1756bf653e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Rename incident refresh services</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Incident" source="com.snc.incident">d596b0643cb1311068bcf327dfe37f08</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_61103ca9239b70108cd8dc1756bf653e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-10-19 08:20:39</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
